dfeR 0.0.0.9015
  • Reference

Read and clean a .sql script for use with RODBC

Source: R/loading_data.R
read_sql_script.Rd

This function allows you to read in and clean .sql string that can be used directly with RODBC.

It removes statements such as USE and GO, all -- comments and ensures formatting is correct. Without this lots of scripts fail when read in and used with RODBC.

read_sql_script(file)

Arguments

file

The .sql file to be read in

Value

Character vector of clean sql query

Examples

if (FALSE) {
read_sql_script("Queries/script_name.sql")
}
